TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInference extends System.Object

summary.span: 從 XML 文件推斷 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from an XML document.
The class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來，將危害您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊。不接受其在受信任的案例。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 請小心不要公開給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. 類別命名空間可讓您推斷 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述從 XML 文件的結構。The class in the namespace allows you to infer an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the structure of an XML document. 類別會輸出可驗證 XML 文件的 XML 結構描述。The class outputs an XML schema that can validate the XML document. 類別支援 W3C XML 和 XML 結構描述標準。The class supports the W3C XML and XML Schemas standards. 它可以用於推斷新的結構描述，或修改現有的結構描述。It can be used to infer a new schema or to refine an existing schema. ## Examples 這個範例做為輸入，將 XML 檔案，並產生可驗證範例 XML 結構描述。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 以下是輸入的 XML 檔案。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 以下是從 XML 文件推斷的結構描述。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 從指定的 XML 文件推斷 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader) As XmlSchemaSet

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 物件，包含從其推斷結構描述的 XML 文件。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

summary.span: 從指定 物件中包含的 XML 文件，推斷 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified.

returns.span: 物件，包含推斷的結構描述。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法推斷其中一個或多個 W3C XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述的 xml 執行個體中包含文件指定的物件。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文件包含項目和屬性從多個命名空間，則會產生多個結構描述： 一個用於每個文件中所使用的命名空間。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, then multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主要的結構描述可以驗證整個 XML 文件的結構描述，而且它的目標命名空間是 XML 文件的文件項目的命名空間相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法會略過任何`xsi:type`， `xsi:schemaLocation`，或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 文件中的屬性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果物件類型，它包含的型別資訊會被忽略。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果物件所在的項目不是 XML 文件的根項目，只有該元素推斷的結構描述。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果物件不位在項目上呼叫方法參數，直到遇到的項目 (例如，當是)。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 此時，推斷程序會開始從該項目。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果沒有任何項目發生之前的文件結尾就會擲回。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例做為輸入，將 XML 檔案，並產生可驗證範例 XML 結構描述。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 以下是輸入的 XML 檔案。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 以下是從 XML 文件推斷的結構描述。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

exception.span: XML 文件的語式不正確。

span.span: The XML document is not well-formed.

exception.span: 物件不位於根節點上或項目上。

span.span: The object is not positioned on the root node or on an element.

exception.span: 結構描述推斷處理序期間發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurs during the schema inference process.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema (System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader, schemas As XmlSchemaSet) As XmlSchemaSet
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ InferSchema(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ instanceDocument, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ schemas);

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 物件，包含從其推斷結構描述的 XML 文件。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 物件，包含用於修改推斷之結構描述的現有結構描述。

span.span: An object containing an existing schema used to refine the inferred schema.

summary.span: 從指定 物件中包含的 XML 文件，推斷 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述，並使用以相同目標命名空間指定之 物件中的現有結構描述，修改推斷的結構描述。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified, and refines the inferred schema using an existing schema in the object specified with the same target namespace.

returns.span: 物件，包含推斷的結構描述。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法推斷其中一個或多個 W3C XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述的 xml 執行個體中包含文件指定的物件。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文件包含項目和屬性從多個命名空間，則會產生多個結構描述： 一個用於每個文件中所使用的命名空間。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主要的結構描述可以驗證整個 XML 文件的結構描述，而且它的目標命名空間是 XML 文件的文件項目的命名空間相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法會略過任何`xsi:type`， `xsi:schemaLocation`，或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`XML 文件中的屬性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果物件類型，它包含的型別資訊會被忽略。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果物件所在的項目不是 XML 文件的根項目，只有該元素推斷的結構描述。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果物件不位在項目上呼叫方法參數，直到遇到的項目 (例如，當是)。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 此時，推斷程序會開始從該項目。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果沒有任何項目發生之前的文件結尾就會擲回。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. - 如果物件會傳遞做為參數和賴以元素物件定位於其中一個在結構描述中定義，推斷的結構描述用來修改現有的結構描述中參數具有相同的目標命名空間;否則，新的結構描述就會推斷為命名空間。If an object is passed as a parameter and the element upon which the object is positioned is defined in one of the schemas in the , the inferred schema is used to refine an existing schema in the parameter with the same target namespace; otherwise, a new schema is inferred for the namespace. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼會採用 XML 文件 1 做為輸入，並產生可驗證 XML 文件 1 的結構描述。The following example code takes XML document 1 as an input and generates a schema that can validate XML document 1. 範例程式碼再將 XML 文件 2，並精簡從 XML 文件 1，根據 XML 文件 2 中的變更所產生的結構描述。The example code then takes XML document 2 and refines the schema generated from XML document 1, based on the changes found in XML document 2. 以下是 XML 文件 1。The following is XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item1.xml#13)] 以下是 XML 文件 2。The following is XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item2.xml#14)] 下列範例程式碼從推斷結構描述中包含的第一個 XML 文件`reader`，然後調整推斷的結構描述中包含的第二個 XML 文件中的變更與`reader1`。The following example code infers a schema from the first XML document contained in `reader`, and then refines the inferred schema with the changes found in the second XML document contained in `reader1`. 範例程式碼會使用第一個多載推斷結構描述和第二個方法多載方法來修改現有的結構描述中物件。The example code uses the first overloaded method to infer the schema, and the second overloaded method to refine the existing schema in the object. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#4)] 下列結構描述是從 XML 文件 1 推斷的結構描述。The following schema is the schema inferred from XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#15](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema1.xml#15)] 下列結構描述中是根據 XML 文件 2 上述結構描述的修改的版本。The following schema is the refined version of the schema above, based on XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema2.xml#16)]

exception.span: XML 文件的語式不正確。

span.span: The XML document is not well-formed.

exception.span: 物件不位於根節點上或項目上。

exception.span: 結構描述推斷處理序期間發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurs during the schema inference process.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption Occurrence { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，影響從 XML 文件推斷的結構描述符合項目宣告。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects schema occurrence declarations inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為，在 XML 文件中遇到的第一個時間項目，就會推斷的結構描述宣告為`minOccurs="1"`。If the property is set to , the first time elements are encountered in the XML document, the schema declaration is inferred as `minOccurs="1"`. 當遇到屬性時，推斷的結構描述宣告為`use="required"`。When attributes are encountered, the schema declaration is inferred as `use="required"`. 如果屬性設定為，項目結構描述宣告會被推斷為`minOccurs="0"`，和屬性結構描述宣告會被推斷為`use="optional"`。If the property is set to , element schema declarations are inferred as `minOccurs="0"`, and attribute schema declarations are inferred as `use="optional"`. 預設值屬性是。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此範例說明項目會受到屬性。This example illustrates how occurrence is affected by the property. 範例程式碼會從 XML 檔案的項目推斷方式有兩種： 寬鬆和限制。The example code infers occurrence from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 以下是範例 XML 檔案。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence1.xml#7)] 下列範例程式碼會指示寬鬆的方式推斷出現的項目和屬性的類別。The following example code instructs the class to infer occurrence of elements and attributes in a relaxed way. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#2)] 因為屬性設定為，下列結構描述所產生。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence2.xml#8)] 在範例程式碼中，如果屬性未設定為、類別會具有預設為並產生下列結構描述。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence3.xml#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption TypeInference { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，影響從 XML 文件推斷的型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects types inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為，具有簡單內容的 XML 文件中元素和屬性的推斷的類型永遠是`xs:string`。If the property is set to , the inferred type of elements and attributes in the XML document with simple content is always `xs:string`. 如果屬性設定為，更特定的類型推斷，例如`xs:date`， `xs:decimal`， `xs:unsignedByte`，依此類推。If the property is set to , more specific types are inferred, such as `xs:date`, `xs:decimal`, `xs:unsignedByte`, and so on. 預設值屬性是。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此範例說明類型推斷會受到屬性。This example illustrates how type inference is affected by the property. 範例程式碼會以兩種不同方式來推斷類型從 XML 檔： 寬鬆和限制。The example code infers types from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 以下是範例 XML 檔案。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference1.xml#10)] 下列範例程式碼會指示類別推斷`xs:string`項目及屬性具有簡單內容。The following example code instructs the class to infer `xs:string` for elements and attributes with simple content. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#3)] 因為屬性設定為，下列結構描述所產生。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference2.xml#11)] 在範例程式碼中，如果屬性未設定為、類別會具有預設為並產生下列結構描述。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#12](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference3.xml#12)]
